```{r load-data}
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(dplyr))

df <- tryCatch(
  haven::read_dta("1_dig-1.dta"),
  error = function(e) {
    message("❌ Error reading file: ", e$message)
    NULL
  }
)

if (!is.null(df)) {
  message("✅ File read successfully.")
}
```
